page.title: 09HURSLEY SHOPS
page.content: MR.Taylor's trade is based on selling {groceries.}He has been a tenant for twenty three years in the Grocer's Shop. The owner is Mrs.Howick who also runs the bakery. Mr.Williams, who is the owner of the {Antique Shop, specializes in mainly {brass and {copper metalwork.}He has been running it for six years and before him a person called D.Macey ran it for nine years. Mr. Williams repairs metal objects and ocasionally woodwork. His trade grows in the summer because of tourists. Mr.Pratt's trade is based on selling {meat and poultry.}He has 350 customers a week who come from Romsey Winchester,Chandler's Ford,Otterbourne and Hursley.The butchery was built 150 years ago as a shop and house in the grounds of the manor,for the use of the {lord of the manor }and his staff. Mr.Pratt opens from Monday to Saturday
